entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9609] It is expected that ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation with a value of 44,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.philips.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInEquityParenthetical should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationMember and a reported value of 978,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.philips.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInEquityParenthetical, http://www.philips.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/H1FJE8H61JGM1JSGM897/2020-12-31/ESEF/NL/0/H1FJE8H61JGM1JSGM897-2020-12-31.zip/H1FJE8H61JGM1JSGM897-2020-12-31/reports/H1FJE8H61JGM1JSGM897-2020-12-31.html 2656

property.value: Reserve of exchange differences on translation
